name: Rogue Unlike
description:
This game was made for My First Game: Winter 2021 https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-winter-2021. The theme for the jam was "Locked."  My idea for this game is that you are locked in a simulation of a security system testings its abilities. At the end of each level, you select an upgrade for the system. 

The goal of the Jam was to learn something new in game development.  My goal was to figure out a simple system of random level generation.  While what I end up with wasn't my goal, but what is implemented works...I'll take it for now. 

How to play - A, D to move, Space to jump, Left click to shoot.

A message from the creator  - As with all my projects there are plans to improve and add more content. Please leave a comment or suggestion.  There may be bugs, please let me know. As right now I know there is an issue with not going to the "end scene" up completion and character death. 

*Update Jan24th, 21* Fixed few know bugs related to above.
